useResourceCacheWhen.description:
When to use the resource file cache.
One of never, fallback, always. Default is fallback 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/build/#useresourcecachewhen

buildStats.description:
When enabled, will collect and write a hugo_stats.json with some build
related aggregated data (e.g. CSS class names).
Note that this was a bool <= v0.115.0. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/build/#buildstats

noJSConfigInAssets.description:
Can be used to toggle off writing of the IntelliSense /assets/jsconfig.js
file. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/build/#nojsconfiginassets

source.description:
Trigger for files matching this regexp. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/build/#source

target.description:
Cache bust targets matching this regexp.
This regexp can contain group matches (e.g. $1) from the source regexp. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/build/#target

items.description: CacheBuster configures cache busting for assets.

cacheBusters.description:
Can used to control how the resource cache gets evicted on rebuilds. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/build/#cachebusters

description: BuildConfig holds some build related configuration.
